Text: I forgot to mention, I don't know if it will work with quad cores and above  since I just own a dual core.
Anyone who downloads and uses this if it worked well for you like it did me will you please post here and let me know.

This is about all the blitzkrieg 1 stuff I have, I have all the games that use blitzkrieg 2 as well. Also alot of people that like blitzkrieg also like the sudden strike series. I have all those as well including hidden stroke. I also the last sudden strike 3 patch released that work correctly. If you go to any website and download the final sudden strike 3 patch its screwed and makes all units in game not able to be destroyed. Took me 2 years to find 1 that works right.
Well, dear clear009, if you have all of the blitzkrieg games, can you please download 'Blitzkrieg 2 - Fall of the Reich' on this site?
Yea.. I'll put Fall of the Reich up...
